generated_body: If you click on "23 Worst Things You Can Say to a New Parent," you might expect a listicle format that outlines various insensitive or unhelpful comments often directed toward new parents. Additionally, it may offer insights into why these comments are problematic, possibly including perspectives from parenting experts or anecdotes from parents themselves. Overall, the piece is likely to emphasize the importance of supportive communication during this transitional phase.
